title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Comprehensively document the detailed requirements for the StoryWorldEcosystem platform. This includes features, user roles (author, editor, moderator), collaboration workflows, integration with AI systems (AI for consistency, suggestion of crossover opportunities), API specifications for external collaborations, addressing potential security concerns, considering accessibility in design, outlining the project's scalability and performance requirements, and delving into the technical complexities such as data governance, error handling, and edge cases. Upon completion, create a comprehensive technical document detailing the platform architecture, data models, system interfaces, and any other architectural decisions made during the process. Additionally, provide clear use cases for each feature to aid in the understanding of its importance and implementation.

title: Design System Architecture for StoryWorldEcosystem
description: Design the overall system architecture for StoryWorldEcosystem, including backend, frontend, database, AI components, and their interactions. Focus on scalability, maintainability, modularity, and performance optimizations while defining technology stack, data models, APIs, and integration points. Implement error handling, security measures, and adherence to industry standards. Ensure the design aligns with the project scope and requirements, and consider potential future crossover opportunities.

title: Develop Backend
description: Implement the backend services for managing stories, authors, and collaboration workflows.

title: Develop Frontend
description: Build the user interface for authors to create, edit, and collaborate on stories, as well as view AI-suggested crossover opportunities.

title: Integrate AI Systems
description: Integrate AI systems for managing story consistency, suggesting crossover opportunities, and potentially generating story content.

title: Set up Database
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing stories, author information, and collaboration data.

title: Implement Security and Access Control
description: Develop and implement security measures, including authentication, authorization, and data protection mechanisms.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the platform, including user guides, developer documentation, and system architecture diagrams.

title: Perform Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans for functional, integration, and performance testing, ensuring the platform meets the defined requirements and quality standards.
